entity.name: New England Patriots vs. Atlanta Falcons
entity.description: Tom Brady and Bill Belichick make their NFL-record seventh Super Bowl appearance when the Patriots take on MVP candidate Matt Ryan and the NFC champion Falcons in Super Bowl LI. This marks New England's ninth overall appearance, also a league record.

entity.name: New England Patriots vs. Atlanta Falcons
NFL Super Bowl 2017 - Patriots vs. Falcons
entity.description: Es ist soweit! SAT.1 und ran.de präsentieren den 51. Super Bowl live aus Houston. In einem spektakulären Spiel treffen der NFC- und der AFC-Champion im NRG Stadium aufeinander. Doch wer wird nach dem Spiel die begehrte Vince-Lombardi-Trophy in den Händen halten?

@Pribengaluru @airfrance Hello Madam, Very sorry for the inconvenience caused. Rqst please provide the ref number of your delayed bag. Rgds
@Uberbikegeek @airfrance We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused. Your bags will be delivered shortly. Thx for ur patience. Rgds
@DJKleffOfficial @AirFranceCA Colleagues from BOM Bag services will call you tomorrow with update. Thanks for your patience. Rgds (1/2)
@DJKleffOfficial @AirFranceCA We sincerely regret the inconvenience. Your bag is under tracing. Our Colleagues will ctc you shortly. (1/1)
@MrsEssaki @jetairways Hello Madam, Trust you have collected the bags from Bangalore airport yesterday. We regret the inconvenience caused.
@saysdiyanag For more info reg your booking/ schedule of flight, you can also call our India call centre at 18001800033 (9-6, Mon-Sat)
@saysdiyanag Yes, as of now, all other flights will depart as per its scheduled time.
@saysdiyanag In case you need any assistance, please DM us your PNR and phone so our colleagues can call you. Regards (2/2)
@saysdiyanag Hello, flight has been rescheduled to depart on 29Dec at 2:30am. The change has been due to technical delay. (1/1)
@WhoIsNilesh Hello Nilesh,Trust our colleagues frm Bag Services Team are in touch with you.They will call you again today with update.Rgds
